entry.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Payment Channels in a CTV+Sapio World
entry.summary: Jeremy Rubin, a Bitcoin developer, shared a post detailing a basic version of payment channels built on top of CTV/Sapio. The post highlights the implications of having non-interactive channel creation and how it can make channel opening more efficient. Rubin is personally bullish about the concept, especially when paired with the payment pool concept he shared earlier. The post can be found on Rubin's website, rubin.io, in the Advent 14 section.
